item.description:
The Secret Book of John - A Hermetic Gnostic formula for Gnosis?
Just what is this strange document? Why does it describe the world the way it does? It's possible that this document was a road map for practicing Gnostic ritual magicians. We'll explore this document as a symbolic treasure-chest and try to piece together a ritual system for your use.
You can read the Secret Book of John here:
http://www.gnosis.org...
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the guy in black with the white collar
item.why: We're a great group and we help each other

group.name: St. Sarah's Parish :: Gnostic Church and Discussion Group

item.name: May Discussion Group
